subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. suspended Rangers right wing Colton Orr for five games Sunday for cross-checking the Washington Capitals star Alexander Ovechkin in the head late in the Rangers’ 4-1 victory Saturday night.
snippet: The N.H.L. suspended Rangers right wing Colton Orr for five games Sunday for cross-checking the Washington Capitals star Alexander Ovechkin in the head late in the Rangers’ 4-1 victory Saturday night.
